pullRequest.title: Cleanups to README, CHANGELOG, CONTRIBUTING
pullRequest.bodyText:
You can see the rendered copies of these change to the following files:

README.md
CHANGELOG.md
CONTRIBUTING.md


Simplifies the flow of information in the README.md. Removes marketing
language "so easy!" etc. Simplifies the project description.
Moves development information into the CONTRIBUTING.md, and re-orients
the project README.md towards end-users, not developers.
Removes the CHANGELOG.md, the presence of which had dangerously misled
the reader to believe it portrayed an accurate and complete depiction of
pre-release changes.  A change log will either be provided via the
GitHub releases page, or will be resumed in a markdown document in this
repository for the 1.0 release.
Fixes the index in the CONTRIBUTING.md, which had not included many of
the sections of the document. The new index includes a section that was
moved from README.md, "Consuming Development Versions of the
Framework".
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.

commit.message:
Cleanups to README, CHANGELOG, CONTRIBUTING

Simplifies the flow of information in the `README.md`. Removes marketing
language "so easy!" etc. Simplifies the project description.

Moves development information into the `CONTRIBUTING.md`, and re-orients
the project `README.md` towards end-users, not developers.

Removes the `CHANGELOG.md`, the presence of which had dangerously misled
the reader to believe it portrayed an accurate and complete depiction of
pre-release changes.  A change log will either be provided via the
GitHub releases page, or will be resumed in a markdown document in this
repository for the 1.0 release.

Fixes the index in the `CONTRIBUTING.md`, which had not included many of
the sections of the document. The new index includes a section that was
moved from `README.md`, _"Consuming Development Versions of the
Framework"_.

Removes the `CHANGELOG.md`, the presence of which had dangerously misled
the reader to believe it portrayed an accurate and complete depiction of
pre-release changes.  A change log will either be provided via the
GitHub releases page, or will be resumed in a markdown document in this
repository for the 1.0 release.

Fixes the index in the `CONTRIBUTING.md`, which had not included many of
the sections of the document. The new index includes a section that was
moved from `README.md`, _"Consuming Development Versions of the
Framework"_.
